data.value: Hello

data.name: sendMailToUserNewPassDescription2
data.value: , you requested new password by filling the form for forgotten password and then visiting the link for resetting the password.

data.value: Your new password is :

data.name: sendMailToUserNewPassDescription4
data.value: You can change it always from your profile page.

data.value: Please, do not answer to this massage as it is automatically sent.

data.name: sendMailToUserOnRegistrationDescription2
data.value: Your user name is :

data.name: sendMailToUserOnRegistrationDescription3
data.value: Your account is currently inactive. You cannot use it until you visit the following link:

data.name: sendMailToUserOnRegistrationDescription4
data.value: Please, do not forget your password as it has been encrypted in our database and we cannot retrieve it for you. However, if you forget your password you can request a new one which will be activated in the same way as this account.

data.name: sendMailToUserOnRegistrationDescription5
data.value: Please do not answer to this message as it is automatically sent.

data.name: sendMailToUserOnRegistrationSubject
data.value: Welcome to wiadvice.com

data.value: Hello

data.value: , you requested new password through

data.name: sendMailToUserResetPassLinkDescription3
data.value: by filling your user name and password in the form.

data.name: sendMailToUserResetPassLinkDescription4
data.value: It will be active only 24 hours, and if you don`t visit it in that time your password won`t change. If you changed your mind or don`t want to reset password don`t visit the link.
